author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: A big pot of chilli is an easy way to make a little meat go a long way.
name: Three Bean Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 green capsicum, deseeded and roughly chopped
1 red capsicum, deseeded and roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the capsicums, onion, and jalapeño in a Dutch oven or large flameproof casserole with a drizzle of oil. Add the tomatoes, sweetcorn,and beans. Stir well to incorporate.

In a heavy-based frying pan, heat the remaining oil over a medium heat. Add the garlic and fry for 1 minute, then add the beef and cook, stirring occasionally, for 3-4 minutes, or until browned all over. Transfer to the casserole, season with the salt and pepper, and add the spices.

Place the uncovered casserole over a low heat and simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally, or until the vegetables are tender. Alternatively, place the dish in an oven preheated at 180°C. Season to taste. Serve hot with cornbread, Cheddar cheese, and soured cream.
